text: North Battleford is a city in the Canadian province of Saskatchewan. The population of North Battleford was 13,836 in 2021. The mayor of North Battleford is Kelli Hawtin. The Battlefords area was home to several aboriginal groups including Cree, Assiniboine and Blackfoot tribes who contested for control of local resources before the European settlement. == References == ==Other websites== *Official website Category:Cities in Saskatchewan
title: North Battleford
